body_html:
Okay, see 0ed66eb for how you can set a min log level for logging in C++ using an environment variable.

Defaults to 0, so all logs are shown. Set TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL to 1 to filter out INFO logs, 2 to additionall filter out WARNING, 3 to additionally filter out ERROR.
body_text:
Okay, see 0ed66eb for how you can set a min log level for logging in C++ using an environment variable.
Defaults to 0, so all logs are shown.  Set TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL to 1 to filter out INFO logs, 2 to additionall filter out WARNING, 3 to additionally filter out ERROR.
body:
Okay, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/0ed66eb560957987901eef40dcf8e74247841528 for how you can set a min log level for logging in C++ using an environment variable.

Defaults to 0, so all logs are shown.  Set TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL to 1 to filter out INFO logs, 2 to additionall filter out WARNING, 3 to additionally filter out ERROR.
